Description: Cell A1 must contain header 'Institution Name'
Cell B1 must contain header 'Total Assets'
Cell A2 must contain first institution name (2-50 chars)
Cell C2 must contain 3-letter currency code
Cell B3 second institution assets (if present)
Cell D5 must contain positive total summary
Cell E5 must contain valid reporting date
Cell F10 must contain authorized signature (5-100 chars)
Range A2:C4 main data block validation
Sum of individual assets must equal total in D5
Reporting date in E5 must be within last 30 days
At least one complete institution record required
